original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = v.UserId AND v.UserId = ph.UserId AND ph.UserId =c.UserId AND v.BountyAmount>=0 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-26 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-08 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Views>=0 AND u.Views<=110 AND u.UpVotes=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-28 19:29:11' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-14 05:29:30' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.BountyAmount >= 0 AND (CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-26 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-08 00:00:00')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E3.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1 AND (CAST(users.Views AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.Views AS INTEGER) <= 110) AND users.UpVotes = 0 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-28 19:29:11' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-14 05:29:30')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E3.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3E4.UserId=E2.UserId)
